name: Wind Power
description: Yeah so that thing about windmills? Basically that but like... Not at all.
effect:
When hit by a Wind move or when Tailwind takes effect, this pokemon is affected as if by the move Charge. These moves include:
- Air Cutter
- Bleakwind Storm
- Blizzard
- Fairy Wind
 -Gust
 -Heat Wave
 -Hurricane
 -Icy Wind
 -Petal Blizzard
 -Sandsear Storm
 -Sandstorm
 -Springtide Storm
 -Tailwind
 -Twister
 -Whirlwind
 -Wildbolt Storm
